Title: Crooklyn
Writer: Joie Lee (story), Joie Lee (screenplay), Spike Lee (screenplay), Cinqué Lee (screenplay)
Actors: Alfre Woodard, Delroy Lindo, David Patrick Kelly, Zelda Harris
Plot: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.
Production: Universal Pictures, 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks
